mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_order ( uid, recv_name, recv_district, recv_addr, recv_zip, recv_phone, recv_tel, total_price, status, created_user, created_time, modified_user, modified_time ) VALUES ( #{uid}, #{recvName}, #{recvDistrict}, #{recvAddr}, #{recvZip}, #{recvPhone}, #{recvTel}, #{totalPrice}, #{status}, #{createdUser}, #{createdTime}, #{modifiedUser}, #{modifiedTime} );

INSERT INTO t_order_item ( order_id, goods_image, goods_title, goods_item_type, goods_price, goods_count, created_user, created_time, modified_user, modified_time ) VALUES ( #{orderId}, #{goodsImage}, #{goodsTitle}, #{goodsItemType}, #{goodsPrice}, #{goodsCount}, #{createdUser}, #{createdTime}, #{modifiedUser}, #{modifiedTime} );
